item.title: ProFTPD <=1.3.5 mod_copy 未授权文件复制漏洞 POC
item.description: Description TJ Saunders 2015-04-07 16:35:03 UTC Vadim Melihow reported a critical issue with proftpd installations that use the mod_copy module's SITE CPFR/SITE CPTO commands; mod_copy allows these commands to be used by *unauthenticated clients*: --------------------------------- Trying 80.150.216.115... Connected to 80.150.216.115. Escape character is '^]'. 220 ProFTPD 1.3.5rc3 Server (Debian) [::ffff:80.150.216.115] site help 214-The following SITE commands are recognized (* =>'s unimplemented) 214-CPFR <sp> pathname 214-CPTO <sp> pathname 214-UTIME <sp> YYYYMMDDhhmm[ss]
